body.name: Listerine Mouthwash, Zero Alcohol, Germ Killing, Less Intense Formula, Bad Breath Treatment, Alcohol Free Mouth Wash for Adults; Cool Mint Flavor, 500 mL (Pack of 6)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 36 mins
features: MOUTHWASH: Listerine zero alcohol mouthwash kills 99.9% of germs that cause bad breath; Leaves your mouth feeling fresh and clean when used as part of your regular oral hygiene routine; Cool Mint flavor.

ZERO ALCOHOL: Bad breath germ killing mouthwash that features a less intense, alcohol free formula and taste that leaves your mouth feeling cleaner than brushing alone; Non alcoholic mouthwash for a refreshing clean that does not feel overpowering.

BAD BREATH TREATMENT: Listerine mouthwash is infused with a cool mint flavor that leaves your mouth feeling clean and freshens breath after only one use; Deep clean effects from the refreshing minty flavor.

#1 DENTIST RECOMMENDED: ADA-Approved and from the #1 Dentist recommended brand for over the counter mouthwashes; Listerine mouthwash has been clinically studied for over 75 years and is the most widely used mouthwash in the world.

INCLUDES: Pack of 6, 500 mL mouthwash; Use regularly during your oral care routine to help contribute to overall good oral hygiene; Rinse for 60 seconds both morning and night or otherwise instructed by a dentist or physician.
body.description: Product Description Say goodbye to bad breath with Listerine Zero Alcohol Cool Mint Mouthwash. Listerine Zero alcohol-free mouthwash kills 99.9% of bad breath germs with a less intense taste for a fresher and cleaner mouth than brushing alone. It features flavors found in Listerine Antiseptic, but in a less intense formula. With approximately two weeks supply in this 500 mL bottle, get 24-hour protection from bad breath germs by rinsing with mouthwash for 30 seconds twice a day, both morning and night. The great-tasting Cool Mint flavor of this less intense, fresh breath mouthwash leaves your mouth feeling clean and refreshed. When the bottle is empty, use it again with the all new Listerine Cool Mint Zero Alcohol Mouthwash Concentrate Refill Pack.*This site contains current product information and may differ from the information on the product packaging you may have. From the Manufacturer New LISTERINE ZERO Mouthwash The Less Intense, Zero Alcohol formula cleans deep to kill millions of bad breath germs for a cleaner, fresher mouth! Less intense Clean Mint flavor and unique alcohol-free formula. No other alcohol-free mouthwash has been proven more effective at killing bad breath germs. Contains signature 4 Essential Oils found in LISTERINE Antiseptic for bad breath protection. From the #1 Dentist recommended OTC Mouthwash Brand.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LISTERINE MOUTHWASH LISTERINE COOL MINT Zero Alcohol Mouthwash gives you the power to kill millions of germs for a mouth that feels clean and refreshed. No other alcohol-free mouthwash has been proven to kill more bad breath germs. No alcohol. No mess. No sweat. LISTERINE MOUTHWASH LISTERINE COOL MINT Zero Alcohol Mouthwash gives you the power to kill millions of germs for a mouth that feels clean and refreshed. No other alcohol-free mouthwash has been proven to kill more bad breath germs. No alcohol. No mess. No sweat.

GERMS WILL BEG FOR MERCY What happens each time you swish properly? LISTERINE COOL MINT Zero Alcohol kills 99.9% of bad breath germs within 30 seconds. THE BOLDEST OF CLEANS Brushing and flossing only go so far. Adding rinsing with LISTERINE COOL MINT Zero Alcohol provides a greater reach for a whole mouth clean. PROTECT AGAINST BAD BREATH Target the root cause of bad breath by remembering to floss daily, brush and rinse with LISTERINE twice daily for 24-hour bad breath germ protection. #1 DENTIST RECOMMENDED BRAND Be sure to schedule appointments with your dentist at least every 6 months. *IQVIA Survey 2022

Previous page Our Purpose Inspiring the world to discover the transformative impact of a clean mouth on a healthier planet. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tons of swish for the money
reviews.reviewText: Not sure why I went for the full 6 pack, but I'm glad I did. The zero alcohol makes it so much easier to swish without burning your face off. We've got enough to last us at least a year. And plenty to share if anybody stops by and needs a swish. We're about to have the healthiest teeth and gums in the community.
